text: Rabbi Yitzchok Scheiner (November 5, 1922 - January 31, 2021) was an American- born Israeli rabbi. He was the rosh yeshiva of the Kamenitz yeshiva of Jerusalem.Hamodia. Dec/19/12. p. C10. In the 1990s, he became a member of the Moetzes Gedolei HaTorah of Degel HaTorah. Scheiner died on January 31, 2021 from COVID-19 in Jerusalem, aged 98. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jerusalem
title: Yitzchok Scheiner
